name: Best-first feature selection
description: Find the best features for modeling using a greedy algorithm

inputs.name: dataset-id
inputs.description: The data to select features from

inputs.name: n
inputs.description: The number of features to select

inputs.name: split-fraction
inputs.descript: Train/test split ratio used for training/evaluation of models

inputs.name: objective-id
inputs.description: Objective field ID, or empty for default dataset objective field

outputs.name: output-features
outputs.description: The list of the n selected fields
